channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
well ive been look around on google, but nothing help i got 5 simple question i would love to get a answer on :) iam using pi
1. ive keep trying power up my morrigan javalin/axe but it wont hit higher then 11....
2. then i am using bars, on a anvil its not open up the smithing menu ?
3. i cannot use bones on altar, either i think something wrong with items on object?
4. of some reason slayer is bugged idk how? :O i get slayer task i kill it its show the lvl up over my head but the skill lvl not raise and i not getting any exp?
5.then i gzip a model, wher i drop it? i triede raw but then my screen crash then try load ti :S
please answer me :)
forgot to ask, if i got a icon like storm of armadyl, and i wanna change it with another icon wher i am doing it?
